text: Micragnostus is a genus of trilobite in the order Agnostida, which existed in what is now north Wales. It was described by Howell in 1935, and the type species is Micragnostus calvus, which was originally described as a species of Agnostus by Lake in 1906.Available Generic Names for Trilobites P.A. Jell and J.M. Adrain. ==References== Category:Agnostidae Category:Trilobites of Europe Category:Paleozoic life of Alberta Category:Paleozoic life of Newfoundland and Labrador Category:Paleozoic life of Yukon
title: Micragnostus
